content.question: Which of the following provides the correct mathematical expression to calculate the <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of a solution made by mixing <math alttext="10.0 milliliters" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>10.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>ml</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="1.00 molar H C l" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.00</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>M</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>HCl</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="11.0 milliliters" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>11.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>mL</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="1.00 molar N a O H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.00</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>M</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>NaOH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> at <math alttext="25 degrees Celsius" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>25</mn><mi>°</mi><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="p H equals the negative log of 0.0010, which equals 3.00" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mtext>log </mtext><mo>(</mo><mn>0.0010</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>3.00</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="p H equals 14.00 plus the log of 0.001, which equals 11.00" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mtext>pH</mtext> <mo>=</mo> <mn>14.00</mn> <mo>+</mo> <mtext>log</mtext> <mo>(</mo> <mn>0.0010</mn> <mo>)</mo> <mo>=</mo> <mn>11.00</mn> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

<math alttext="p H equals 14.00 plus the log of the fraction 0.0010 over 0.0210, which equals 12.68" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext><mo>=</mo><mn>14.00</mn><mo>+</mo><mtext>log</mtext><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.0010</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>0.0210</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>12.68</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="p H equals 14.00 plus the log of the fraction 0.0010 over 0.0110, which equals 12.96" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext><mo>=</mo><mn>14.00</mn><mo>+</mo><mtext>log</mtext><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.0010</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>0.0110</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>12.96</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="p H equals 14.00 plus the log of the fraction 0.0010 over 0.0210, which equals 12.68" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext><mo>=</mo><mn>14.00</mn><mo>+</mo><mtext>log</mtext><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.0010</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>0.0210</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>12.68</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
